definition.text: Before they may contribute, people need to find out about Superalgos in the first place! The referral program built-in the Governance Project is designed to incentivize the promotion of the project, either by word-of-mouth or “en masse” through articles, social media posts, videos, and other forms of influencer marketing.

paragraphs.text: In a nutshell, you may earn Superalgos (SA) Tokens for every user you refer to the project and their descendants!

The core idea is that you may earn a percentage of the tokens allocated to the Referrals Rewards Pool on each release. The amount depends on the Token Power that the people you refer — and those they refer — let into their Referral Program.
You declare who your referrers are by establishing references from User Referrer nodes under the Referral Program node to the User Profile of the persons you learned about Superalgos from.

There is no hard definition of who or what a referrer is. It is up to you to decide. Maybe you learned about Superalgos from an article, a video, a comment on Reddit, a tweet, the official website, or someone told you about us!

Declaring your referrers is the best way to thank the person that may have written that article or tweet, produced that video, maintained the website, or the friend who told you about Superalgos! Without them, you probably wouldn’t be here yet!
The program features a Token Bonus. That is, simply by declaring your referrers, you earn tokens!
